item.title: Are y'all thinking of adding new customizations behind a paywall?
item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
IMO what would be cool is if they did a bit of both that, and the opposite. A special skin or execution only available to people who contributed to the game, is awesome and I fully applaud.

Though I would say I’d also be really impressed if there were some skins you couldn’t buy with real cash. Maybe a few achievement based skins… IE “this skin is available if you win 40 games as prince” etc…

That all being said, what I love most about this game, is that they clearly spend way more time and focus on balancing gameplay and mechanics, and much less time on skins/executions, which to be quite honest in this style of game I forget they are there because I’m too busy analyzing the chats.
